This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside smoking a cigarette on my side porch and spotted an abnormally bright, pulsating object, high in the atmosphere. Initially I believed it to be a star, but it had an orange tint to it so I watched it for a while and that's when I realized it pulsated more than an average star. I went inside to get my crappy Nikon Coolpix 3200 digital camera and snapped a few photos at full zoom. When I downloaded these photos they seemed all black, so I put them on the computer and pressed Auto Adjust Color and the objects were more visible and took on a weird form.
